news_items.title: Avoid being fined for fly-tipping this festive season
news_items.description: We are urging residents to make use of the multiple authorised waste schemes and services available this festive season, following 4 substantial fly-tipping fines.

news_items.title: Christmas bin collection dates and recycling centre opening times
news_items.description:
We are reminding residents to check their bin collection days over the festive period. 

Due to the bank holidays over Christmas and New Year, there will be changes to the usual collection schedule.

news_items.title: Postal voters urged to reapply
news_items.description: Electors who applied for a postal vote in or before January 2024, now have to reapply to receive their ballot paper through the post.

news_items.title: Hull expands support for families with new Healthy Start vitamin pilot
news_items.description: We are strengthening our support for pregnant women, new parents and young children with the launch of a new vitamin distribution pilot across 3 Family Hubs.
